title: PM, Swiss Fed. Councillor discuss flood devastation
content:
GENEVA, Jan 9 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif and Federal Councillor of Switzerland Ignazio Cassis on Monday discussed in detail the devastation caused by recent floods in Pakistan.
The prime minister and the Swiss federal councillor met on the sidelines of the International Conference on Resilient Pakistan in Palais des Nations, PM Office Media Wing said in a press release.
Bilateral relations between Pakistan and Switzerland were also discussed in the meeting.
